Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, for me it really wasn't a case of deciding to be an astronaut

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself to be very fortunate in my career, my timing has worked out

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: And, I was really impressed with how beautiful our country was and how friendly the people were

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in space, I'm really looking forward to working with this team of folks that I'm with

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's been a tremendous amount of work that's been done that you can't see in Columbia

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Those folks out in the space suits are going to be getting beat up

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: So, we have to get up and get pumped up for each day

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Now you're coming back to Earth, and things are getting more and more dynamic

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually think sadness and darkness can be very beautiful and healing

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: But I can't really say there is too much modern music that I'm blown away by at this moment

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: It's inevitable your environment will influence what you do

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: So, once I've written a song, you know, I'm pretty happy with what the song is on its own terms

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't say that I've had a tough life by any stretch of the imagination

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: Simon Hale, the British arranger, does all string and wood arrangements on my records

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: I think in a way I was probably completely naive about what it takes to make something become a hit

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: Happy music doesn't tend to move me much

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: I make the kind of music I like

Quote.Author: Duncan Sheik
Quote.QuoteValue: Things come to me pretty regularly. There is never a shortage or a backlog

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter where I'm going, I always have sunglasses, a book, and some gum in my carry-on

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Sushi is one of my favorite foods

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't imagine dating someone famous. I try to stay away from that as much as I can

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Modeling is not a passion of mine. I have been having fun with it, but it's just to pay the bills

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I will always eat pizza! Always

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a private Instagram and an official one, so I'm not opposed to social media

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing, directing... anything behind the camera is what I want to do

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my parents love that I want to do something a little different than what they do

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm dying to go to India

Quote.Author: Dylan Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream dinner party guests would be Ethel Kennedy, Truman Capote and Hunter S. Thompson

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: A good farmer is nothing more nor less than a handy man with a sense of humus

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: Be obscure clearly

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is an act of faith, not a trick of grammar

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not often that someone comes along who is a true friend and a good writer

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: I see nothing in space as promising as the view from a Ferris wheel

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know which is more discouraging, literature or chickens

Quote.Author: E. B. White
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with the profit system has always been that it was highly unprofitable to most people

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is an exploration. You start from nothing and learn as you go

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: The historian will tell you what happened. The novelist will tell you what it felt like

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is a socially acceptable form of schizophrenia

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a number of vices, one of which is moderation

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: Like art and politics, gangsterism is a very important avenue of assimilation into society

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: Books are acts of composition: you compose them. You make music: the music is called fiction

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to avoid experience if I can. Most experience is bad

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no longer any such thing as fiction or nonfiction; there's only narrative

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're working well, you don't do research. Whatever you need comes to you

Quote.Author: E. L. Doctorow
Quote.QuoteValue: The nature of good fiction is that it dwells in ambiguity

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: The sadness of the incomplete, the sadness that is often Life, but should never be Art

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is always being given where it is not required

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something majestic in the bad taste of Italy

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Two cheers for Democracy; one because it admits variety, and two because it permits criticism

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Think before you speak is criticism's motto; speak before you think, creation's

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Paganism is infectious, more infectious than diphtheria or piety

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: One must be fond of people and trust them if one is not to make a mess of life

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Nonsense and beauty have close connections

Quote.Author: E. M. Forster
Quote.QuoteValue: Most quarrels are inevitable at the time; incredible afterwards

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Ants have the most complicated social organization on earth next to humans

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Destroying rainforest for economic gain is like burning a Renaissance painting to cook a meal

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The education of women is the best way to save the environment

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Political ideology can corrupt the mind, and science

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: In my heart, I'm an Alabaman who went up north to work

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Every kid has a bug period... I never grew out of mine

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have seen one ant, one bird, one tree, you have not seen them all

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no better high than discovery

Quote.Author: E. O. Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The human mind evolved to believe in the gods. It did not evolve to believe in biology

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the surprising things in this world is the respect a worthless man has for himself

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: A young man is a theory, an old man is a fact

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: Many people would be more truthful were it not for their uncontrollable desire to talk

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: Fishing seems to be the favorite form of loafing

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: To be an ideal guest, stay at home

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: Instead of loving your enemies - treat your friends a little better

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: Some men are alive simply because it is against the law to kill them

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: Never tell a secret to a bride or a groom; wait until they have been married longer

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: The average man's judgment is so poor, he runs a risk every time he uses it

Quote.Author: E. W. Howe
Quote.QuoteValue: A man will do more for his stubbornness than for his religion or his country

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: People with goals succeed because they know where they're going

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: You are, at this moment, standing, right in the middle of your own 'acres of diamonds.'

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind moves in the direction of our currently dominant thoughts

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: Executive ability is deciding quickly and getting somebody else to do the work

Quote.Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote.QuoteValue: All you have to do is know where you're going. The answers will come to you of their own accord

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: The police must obey the law while enforcing the law

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the spirit and not the form of law that keeps justice alive

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: In civilized life, law floats in a sea of ethics

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: We conclude that in the field of public education the doctrine of 'separate but equal' has no place

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: To get what you want, STOP doing what isn't working

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that the greatest reward for doing is the opportunity to do more

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I did in my life that was worthwhile, I caught hell for

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty, not communism, is the most contagious force in the world

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: The censor's sword pierces deeply into the heart of free expression

Quote.Author: Earl Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: If it is a mistake of the head and not the heart don't worry about it, that's the way we learn

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: On my tombstone just write, 'The sorest loser that ever lived.'

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to winning baseball games is pitching, fundamentals, and three run homers

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: No one's gonna give a damn in July if you lost a game in March

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: This ain't a football game, we do this every day

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't worry, the fans don't start booing until July

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the National League has better biorhythms in July

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing that matters is what happens on the little hump out in the middle of the field

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: Momentum? Momentum is the next day's starting pitcher

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: Coaches are an integral part of any manager's team, especially if they are good pinochle players

Quote.Author: Earl Weaver
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there should be bad blood between all clubs

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: A vacation is what you take when you can no longer take what you've been taking

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: One way to get high blood pressure is to go mountain climbing over molehills

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is as embarrassing as watching your boss do something you assured him couldn't be done

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman may race to get a man a gift but it always ends in a tie

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nonchalance is the ability to remain down to earth when everything else is up in the air

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Snow and adolescence are the only problems that disappear if you ignore them long enough

Quote.Author: Earl Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is what enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Innocence is one of the most exciting things in the world

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: My recipe for life is not being afraid of myself, afraid of what I think or of my opinions

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Greed is so destructive. It destroys everything

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a mother and I know the feeling of having a baby come out of my gut

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I never take anything for granted. I may slip any minute

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to teach dance lessons

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the original 'Material Girl.'

Quote.Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's take care of the necessities first: give people jobs, and find a way to get us out of poverty

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: Raising kids is part joy and part guerrilla warfare

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know who made the Earth. I woke up one morning, and it's here. I make the best of it

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: I went into acting as psychotherapy, and it's still a work in progress

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: Where the work goes, I go. Wherever adulation occurs, that's where you'll find me

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a newspaper editor in high school, and I truly thought of journalism as a career. I loved it

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't work with Cloris Leachman, you experience her

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: Always keep yourself engaged, in theater, in whatever job you can get

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't get an acting job, then go backstage. Or take tickets

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a method actor, though I studied for a year with Lee Strasburg

Quote.Author: Ed Asner
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved getting to Chagrin Falls, being by the falls; what a cute place it is

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: The fireworks begin today. Each diploma is a lighted match. Each one of you is a fuse

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: If you seek violence, we will seek to put you in jail

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: You punch me, I punch back. I do not believe it's good for one's self-respect to be a punching bag

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to love them. You just have to respect their rights

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: The person who is bent on killing you will follow you wherever you are

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: In action be primitive; in foresight, a strategist

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: The mere process of growing old together will make the slightest acquaintance seem a bosom friend

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: How'm I doing?

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: To learn something new every day is still exciting!

Quote.Author: Ed Koch
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being the mayor. I want to be the mayor forever

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: Be original; don't be scared of being bold!

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had really messy hair

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of my tattoos are a bit silly, but I know where and what time I got them

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've been around for a while. But I still have to pay my dues

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Kiss Me.' That's my 'Twilight' tune, a song you'd have on the 'Twilight' soundtrack

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to have a career that evolves as I go on

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really do that whole 'single life' thing. I'm kind of heads down and get things done

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: It was my love for the guitar that first got me into music and singing

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: Harry Potter is awesome

Quote.Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge hip-hop fan from way back in the day

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so sick of people misunderstanding Asians in America and what we're about

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to prove you don't need to have academic syntax to be intelligent

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: Black culture has been a huge influence in my life

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I had no desire to be a chef, but I had a desire to be someone who was heard

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I blog because I have something to say

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, juicing isn't about binging and cleansing; I try to incorporate it into a balanced diet

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I have more to say as a writer than from behind a wok

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: My only goal as a comedian was to stomp the life out of the model-minority myth

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't meant to be an attorney, but I was meant to go to law school

Quote.Author: Eddie Huang
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being on camera, performing, seeing what people have in common

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: I just believe in the goodwill of people, the power of people to do something positive

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've never seen an elephant ski, you've never been on acid

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: Cats have a scam going - you buy the food, they eat the food, they go away; that's the deal

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a one-man idiot

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: I like my coffee like I like my women. In a plastic cup

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanna live 'til I die, no more, no less

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: Never put a sock in a toaster

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Europe, where the history comes from

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: Animals in the wild are lean, and I think we should be too

Quote.Author: Eddie Izzard
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be less well-known in comedy

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: The trick to acting is not to show off, it's to think the thoughts of the character

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got four kids - I unblock a toilet every day

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: My business is not to show anybody anything; my job is just to do it

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to do a lot of comedy. I don't know what happened. I think it's my face

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to work with Bryan Singer because I like his films

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the fact that everyone's trying to be good-looking in L.A. - then I turn up and I get work

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm used to playing characters who have a lot to say but don't know how to say it

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I always think of Gilbert Norrell as being Salieri to Jonathan Strange being Mozart

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a great fiction reader. I love history. I love history and philosophy

Quote.Author: Eddie Marsan
Quote.QuoteValue: Private education can give you confidence, which is marvellous; a sense of entitlement isn't

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: The advice I would give to someone is to not take anyone's advice

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the Beatles

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I started out as a stand-up comedian. And that's what I'm most comfortable doing

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a comedian who got into movies, so I don't really think of myself as an actor

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Music has always been around with me

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: As you get older, you get different, and I'm a mushier, softer person as I get older

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not performing anymore. I reveal myself to the audience. I reveal myself. That's the show now

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the artist when I'm doing music that I am when I'm acting. I'm everything

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: My first concert makes me sound like a real old man. My very first concert was Jackie Wilson

Quote.Author: Eddie Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in a position that allows me to do what I want to do, and I do it

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Velvet is great. It's warm as well. And it's snug

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really committed to being an actor. It never felt like it would be possible, I guess

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors are actors, and there should be a complete fluidity for anyone to play anything

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Our dream as actors is to tell interesting stories about interesting people

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always been a relationship between the film world and fashion

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always find the things that make a role complicated!

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: It can be a miserable profession, acting, because you always want what you can't have

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Going to the Oscars is always the most sensory overload and a huge amount of fun

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been a closet lover of faux-reality TV since 'The Hills'. It's bad

Quote.Author: Eddie Redmayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Filming is about continuing to be alert and to think, and I find it quite exhausting

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: I can give you a six-word formula for success: Think things through - then follow through

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: Aviation is proof that given, the will, we have the capacity to achieve the impossible

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll fight like a wildcat until they nail the lid of my pine box down on me

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: I've cheated the Grim Reaper more times than anyone I know

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather have a million friends than a million dollars

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: Fighting in the air is not a sport. It is scientific murder

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall never ask any pilot to go on a mission that I won't go on

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the easiest thing in the world to die. The hardest is to live

Quote.Author: Eddie Rickenbacker
Quote.QuoteValue: Never count on the crowd to take care of you

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always about the music, never about anything else

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a drunk anymore, but since they cut out my tongue, I sound drunk

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the one in the band that said I'm not going on tour unless we do a record

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: We're musicians. We make music for a living. It's that simple. Nothing else matters

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about sound. It's that simple

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have selective hearing

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm writing, and just doing the same thing I always do

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: Nirvana was huge, but it didn't appeal to everyone

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: The name Van Halen, the family legacy, is going to go on long after I'm gone

Quote.Author: Eddie Van Halen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll be making music 'til the day I die. I've done all kinds of stuff, and more is coming

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: The love received is the love that is saved

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an art to live with pain... mix the light into gray

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, whether you like it or not, people elevate you. It's real easy to fall

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: Life moves fast. As much as you can learn from your history, you have to move forward

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need drugs to make my life tragic

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: I think celebrities suck

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: Caffeine. The gateway drug

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's a good cause, I'll play just about anything

Quote.Author: Eddie Vedder
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not a bad time to be me

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: People will see me at Chelsea the way I am and judge me the way they want to

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: You question yourself all the time as a footballer. You have to focus on the positives

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: I ask myself what I can do to become like Messi and Ronaldo and score 50 or 60 goals in a season

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to win the games, to win trophies

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: The Premier League is difficult. The small teams can beat the big teams

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are young, you sometimes play one good game and then one bad game

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always good to be on the scoresheet

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: My target is to give everything, and only if we win the trophies will I be relaxed

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: It's true that I'm even better than I could have imagined, both in football and in my private life!

Quote.Author: Eden Hazard
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew that Chelsea was a club that changed its manager reasonably often

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in God. I do believe in Judaism. I believe in ethics, morals

Quote.Author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd vote for Mickey Mouse before I voted for John McCain and Sarah Palin
